name: tiny-mushroom
short_effect: Fire Red and Leaf Green: Trade two for prior Level-up moves. Sell for 250 Pokédollars, or to Hungry Maid for 500 Pokédollars.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: A small and rare mushroom. It is quite popular among certain maniacal fan segments.
flavor_text.platinum: A small and rare mushroom. It is quite popular among certain maniacal fan segments.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: A small and rare mushroom. It is quite popular among certain maniacal fan segments.
